ocean.question: I'm big and blue, and fish swim in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I'm a very, very large puddle!
🚢 Boats like to sail on me.
🐠 Lots of creatures live in me.

ocean.question: I have a shell and I crawl slowly on the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I carry my house on my back.
🐌 I'm very slow!
🏖️ You might see me at the beach.

ocean.question: I am a very big fish with sharp teeth.

hints.text: 🦷 I have lots of pointy teeth.
🦈 People sometimes get scared of me.
🌊 I live in the ocean and I hunt.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I have no bones.
🖍️ Some of my kind can change colors.
8️⃣ I have lots of arms to grab things!

ocean.question: I'm a colorful fish that lives in coral reefs.

hints.text: 🐠 I come in many bright colors!
🏠 I live with my friends.
🪸 I make my home in the colorful coral.

ocean.question: I'm a big animal that squirts water out of my blowhole.

hints.text: 🐳 I'm a mammal, not a fish.
🗣️ I communicate with songs.
⛲ I shoot water high into the air!

ocean.question: I have a hard shell and pinch with my claws. What am I?

hints.text: 🦀 I walk sideways!
🤏 Be careful of my pinchers!
🍽️ People like to eat me.

ocean.question: I can sting you with my long, dangly arms.

hints.text: 🪱 I look like a wiggly blob of jelly.
🌊 I float around in the water.
🩹 If you get stung, you need help!

ocean.question: I'm a big sea bird that dives into the ocean to catch fish.

hints.text: 🐦 I have big wings to fly over the water.
🎣 I'm a good fisherman.
🌊 I like to live near the ocean.

ocean.question: I am a very large ice mass that floats in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I'm very, very cold!
🌊 I can be dangerous to ships.
🏔️ Only a small part of me is visible above the water.

food.question: I am yellow and long, monkeys love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I'm a fruit!
🌳 I grow on trees.
🐒 Monkeys go bananas for me!

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me with your cookies. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I am a liquid.
🐄 I come from an animal that says 'moo'.
🍪 I taste yummy with cookies!

food.question: I am round and red, and grow on a tree. Sometimes a worm lives in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 I am a popular fruit.
🥧 You can make pie with me.
🐛 Sometimes a critter likes to nibble on me!

food.question: I am orange and crunchy. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a vegetable.
🐰 Bugs Bunny eats me all the time.
👀 I'm good for your eyesight!

food.question: I am small and green. You can eat me with a spoon, or mashed. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am a vegetable.
🤢 Some people don't like me, but I'm good for you!
🥣 I'm often served as a baby food.

food.question: I am brown and grow underground. You can bake me or fry me to make chips. What am I?

hints.text: 🥔 I am a root vegetable.
🍟 I can be made into crispy fries.
🌎 I come in different colors, even purple!

food.question: I am long and thin, made of wheat. You can eat me with red sauce. What am I?

hints.text: 🍝 I am a type of noodle.
🍅 I am often served with tomato sauce.
🇮🇹 Italy is known for me!

food.question: I am made from flour, water, and yeast. You can make a sandwich with me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 I am a staple food.
🥪 I am used to make sandwiches.
👩‍🍳 You can bake me in an oven.

food.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy skin and a big seed inside. I'm yummy in the summer. What am I?

hints.text: 🍑 I am a stone fruit.
☀️ I am best eaten during the summer.
🥤 I can be used in smoothies and pies.

food.question: I am made of corn, but you eat me one kernel at a time at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 I am a snack.
🎬 I am very popular at the cinema.
🔥 You need heat to make me!
